event.name: Start
event.text: Tip: Pay attention to your choices, and each event's text. There may be useful information.

event.name: Mysterious Temple
event.text: You arrive at a mysterious temple. The temple entrance, once sealed behind almost a metre of rock, is partially open.

event.name: Inside the Mysterious Temple
event.text: There are two doors, plus the exit.

choice.event:
A teleport trap activates, and returns you to the outside of the temple. A large boulder rolls from the inside of the temple and blocks the entrance.
Leave.

event.text: A pit trap activates. You fall and get rescued by your party members.

textlist.name: Waterfall Text
textlist.text: You arrive at a beautiful waterfall. A small cliff faces the waterfall.
You climb up to the top of a small cliff. You see a large waterfall facing you.

One of your party members tells you that according to local lore, the legendary hero Etho shaped the mountain and the waterfall with his own hands. You recall that Etho had a cave filled with treasures and other useful resources.
One of your party members is talking with a local. You overhear the local talking of a local legend of treasure hidden behind a waterfall.

One of your party members is in an argument with a local. You overhear the local retort, "Because there's always treasure hidden behind every single waterfall!" Your party requests an opportunity to investigate behind the waterfall.

event.text: Underneath the waterfall, you see what appears to be a narrow ledge about 12 metres above you. You head back to the cliff.

choice.text: Try to jump through the waterfall.

event.text: It was a trap! Bandits attack you once you jump through the waterfall and land in a cave.

On jumping through the waterfall, you land in a large cave. While the place may have looked beautiful at one point, it is overgrown with vines and moss. However, you find a extensive tunnel system, and the entrance to a minecart system. You also find the remains of a small medical centre. You use the medical supplies at the medical station to heal some wounds, and use the minecart system to take you farther towards your destination.
